lang.pfx:label: Are you really intelligent enough to click this button?

lang.name: default
lang.h3: What the code for the form looks like:
lang.p: For further functions of the pfx namespace refer to other projects done with it or the stylesheets in the core/ directory

The above form does really nothing except: accept your input and refer you to another page on the website which is accidentally the next one in the pageflow that was defined in your servlet.prop.in file
lang.tt:
<pfx:forminput target="_top">
<pfx:errorbox width="500"/>
<pfx:xinp name="info.Adult" type="radio" value="true"/>
<pfx:xinp name="info.Adult" type="radio" value="false"/>
<pfx:xinp type="submit" value="Go!"/>
</pfx:forminput>
lang.p: The info in the above example makes up the 'namespace' for this form. This is needed for the configuration of pagerequests in the servlet conf to associate this page with IWrappers. The "Adult" is the field in the IWrapper that is associated with this form value.
